pageContext.claim: “When I begrudgingly signed the Omnibus Bill, I was promised the Wall and Border Security by leadership. Would be done by end of year (NOW). It didn't happen! We foolishly fight for Border Security for other countries - but not for our beloved U.S.A. Not good!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump was given no promises. He's been on the campaign trail claiming he had secured more funds, even acting as he was spending it. But the votes were never there for a $5 billion appropriation.
